website_summaries.verdict: Their handy features and superior warranty make them a solid choice, though the tradeoff is the possibility of hassles setting them up.
pros: A sawhorse set that stands out for versatility – height adjusts from 22" to 32"
Galvanized steel capable of handling up to 2,600 lb
Backed by an impressive limited lifetime warranty
cons: Issues folding and securing the legs into place have been reported
Falls on the higher end of the price spectrum

customer_reviews.title: Very durable and stron
customer_reviews.text: Not sure where the negative reviews are coming from. These are amazing. They set up so easily and are amazingly sturdy. Break down is just as quick and easy. I have been using these to process pallet wood. They get beat on and slammed and prayed on and loaded up and they have stood the test. Even the foam bumpers on the top are not showing wear yet (so far just pallet wood but plenty of nails and staples) I suspect these will last me a long time. Very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good for a workbench, less confident in their weight rating
customer_reviews.text: The legs are extendable, and can easily get stuck in a folded up position. Very hard to get unstuck when this happens. Shipping had rattled them into this unfortunate configuration, and it took me 10 minutes and various pry tools to get them unfolded the first time. The materials are a little "lighter weight" than I expected, though the rating of 1300lbs is clearly printing on them. I bought these to make a platform for working on my lightweight truck camper. Given that I can leave the jacks down, I feel reasonably ok about them in this scenario, and when I use them to make a regular work bench they are very nice.
customer_reviews.author: A. Kay

customer_reviews.title: I am Loving Them
customer_reviews.text: These set up easily, support adequate weight, have a very night vertical sheet mount option, are surprisingly sturdy and are a dream to store. I hope their longevity is going to match their functionality and overall design.
customer_reviews.author: John J. Baich

customer_reviews.title: Also was disappointed the base of the legs are bare
customer_reviews.text: Well built, and fits the need, but when received the lower legs were extended which blocks the 2x4 section from folding out. Made it very difficult to open. Also was disappointed the base of the legs are bare, painted steel. Expected some rubber feet for added protection.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect height for using two 7' 2x4's to support a table tennis top, almost 100% regulation height!
customer_reviews.text: Great Quality sawhorse set. They came slightly dented, but I believe it happened during shipping. They still perform exactly as they should. Overall, great product. Perfect height for using two 7' 2x4's to support a table tennis top, almost 100% regulation height!
customer_reviews.author: Bradlab2k

customer_reviews.title: I like the portability and size
customer_reviews.text: I like the portability and size. I am still a little fearful I am going to get a finger pinched in the opening and closing of the legs one of these days. The adjustable legs are great for using outside on uneven surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: karl f lundin

customer_reviews.title: These Sawhorses allowed me to put my old plastic ones away
customer_reviews.text: Being able to adjust the legs individually for different platforms and then just fold them up and put them away when done works great for me in my somewhat confined work spaces. Great quality and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: JohnEO

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty, fold up nicely, look great
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to use them yet, but I have folded them out and stood them up, they felt very sturdy, well made. Look professional.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan A.

customer_reviews.title: No quality control prior to shipping the product
customer_reviews.text: After opening the box I saw several screws and two loose parts inside the box, can not figure out where the two piece go. The legs were jammed inside the housing and I needed a screwdriver to get them out, I also noticed that some of the pop rivers was missing at the sheet metal closures piece. It seams there’s no quality control at the factory.
customer_reviews.author: Wolf

customer_reviews.title: very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: bought two loaded them heavey one lost a little screw and was jambed up by the legs extending in the unit took some min to fix and a min to learn but very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: lawrence pouliot

customer_reviews.title: Would by again
customer_reviews.text: As I expected, and I expect a lot out of my purchases.good construction.
customer_reviews.author: Don Bell

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, strong, sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Versatile, strong, sturdy, compact when folded, light weight for its strength rating.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Lawrence

customer_reviews.title: husband's helper
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these and uses them all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Susie B

customer_reviews.title: Better value options out there with more versatility
customer_reviews.text: Decent for what they are but toughbuilt brand from homedepot for $50 ea (we have both sets) are more versatile and adjustable for 30% less. Ordered them online and they drop shipped to us.
customer_reviews.author: Austinite

customer_reviews.title: Really sturdy
customer_reviews.text: OMG! These are wonderful! We've been dealing with wood and plastic saw horses, and what a pain. These things are sturdy and look and feel like they could hold up an elephant. They were a bit pricey, but worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: Great item just what I had been looking for. It takes a few times getting familiar with it but would trade them for another one. Adjustable height and sturdy as all get out. I really like my new saw horses.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves em!
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these. They are great! Wont sink when used and he is very happy with the quality
customer_reviews.author: MegjgeM

customer_reviews.title: ... with one missing and box completely destroyed it was great.
customer_reviews.text: Aside from arriving with one missing and box completely destroyed it was great.
customer_reviews.author: Clayton Dittman

customer_reviews.title: Strongest Sawhorse Set
customer_reviews.text: Exceptionally strong, very well built and the quality of the materials is evident immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Rick & Christy

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy These!
customer_reviews.text: Beware, I think the design is OK, but the way these were shipped caused one set of adjustable legs to move into and lock in place thus blocking the top legs from being able to come out. These saw horses need to be shipped double boxed with padding (they were not) the box was obviously dropped very hard many times, as there was loose hardware and the inside legs (#2) telescoped and locked into place thus locking the top legs (#1) inplace... tried to release the legs down inside the saw horses, no luck. I would not buy these from Amazon or anyone online as they are not packaged or designed to handle the riggers of shipment.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Handy sawhorses and sturdy. They save room folding up...my husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Carla Herrmann

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Opened the package turned them over to unfold and screws just started falling out. Couldn’t get the first leg to even come out. Had to stick a screwdriver in it and pry it out. Glad I spent my money on this junk
customer_reviews.author: Brian R

customer_reviews.title: Versatile
customer_reviews.text: An excellent versatile pair of sawhorses which can be fitted into a large table rather quickly, and folded up and stored. I love mine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not have purchased if I had seen the craftsmanship prior
customer_reviews.text: Very unstable not worth the money spent very Flimsy Would not trust 200lb between the pair
customer_reviews.author: Chirs Haidusek

customer_reviews.title: works if you leave it open
customer_reviews.text: Hard to open and close. Does not lock in properly
customer_reviews.author: Jkays

customer_reviews.title: Nice sawhorses
customer_reviews.text: Got here sooner than excepted. Have them set up being used already. Like them.
customer_reviews.author: Wyoming Guy

customer_reviews.title: Stay away, buy something else.
customer_reviews.text: Stay away, buy something else. The design is seriously flawed. Out of the box the legs won't unfold. Check out some of the other 1 star reviews, they are dead on.
customer_reviews.author: Judith B.

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my sister. She loves it. The strength is great and the fact that they are adjustable is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia Nakamura

customer_reviews.title: ... past 35 years and this is by far the best
customer_reviews.text: I've been building projects at home and the job site for the past 35 years and this is by far the best designed and built sawhorses I've ever seen.Im sure these are going to be a great addition to my tool collection
customer_reviews.author: LJ

customer_reviews.title: Compact, super stable, very portable.
customer_reviews.text: If these are anything likenthe ones I got from lowes, they are identical, just different paint, they are excellent. Extremely sturdy, height adjustability is great. They fold up really compact. I've had many varieties of sawhorses, wood, foldable metal, plastic, a mix of the above, these are hands down the best I've used as far as portability, stability, and ease of use. If you want super compact, super stable horses, to setup a temporary work surface, do yourself a favor and buy a pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: oogabooga

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product
customer_reviews.text: These are terrible. Very very hard to get the legs in and out. They are also not sturdy at all. I would not recommend buying these...I bought as a gift for my fiancé and we used them the first time yesterday and I am so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.text: Got them from a brick and mortar big box store that was having supply issues with their in house Masterforce brand. Couldn't be happier. Gave away all my plastic POS ones that were used for a work surface, I used metal wood top ones for cutting on. I was luckily able to check Amazon reviews while in store before I bought them and am extremely satisfied with them. Especially at $40 each.
customer_reviews.author: MNGr33nGr4ss

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Garbage I’ll stick to the wood of plastic. These have no shear. Rickety crap.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy and easily adjusted - my husband loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A little light but works well.
customer_reviews.text: The click height adjustment doesn't fine tune useful height control.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

product_meta.title: PROTOCOL Equipment Adjustable Height Work Table Folding Sawhorses, Set of Two, Durable Steel Construction, Folding Legs, 2x4 Table Support Arms, 2,600 lb. Combined Loading Capacity
product_meta.description:
Style:Deluxe Adjustable FoldingMaster any task with the PROTOCOL Equipment SH-042 Work Shop Adjustable Sawhorse. Constructed of high-grade, corrosion-resistant steel, this set of sawhorses features an impressive 2,600 lb. table capacity. With an adjustable height of 25.5-32.5 inches, these sawhorses can combine to create a number of useful applications. Innovative material support pegs allow for sturdy support while cutting, while the 42-inch width and 2 x 4 support arms let you easily create a jobsite table, workbench, scaffolding support and more.

PROTOCOL tools are designed to exceed the requirements of entry-level pro contractors and DIY customers shopping in select retailers.
feature_bullets: Set of two sawhorses constructed of durable steel
Folding galvanized legs and convenient built-in carrying handle
Adjustable height of 25.5 inches to 32.5 inches, 42-inches wide

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars106 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
